definition[0]: lofty mountains, buildings etc are very high and impressive
example[0]: He stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel, from whose lofty heights he could see across New York.
definition[1]: lofty ideas, beliefs, attitudes etc show high standards or high moral qualities – use this to show approval
example[1]: lofty ideals of equality and social justice
example[2]: He had set himself the lofty goal of reaching the world’s top five.
definition[2]: seeming to think you are better than other people – used to show disapproval
example[3]: She has such a lofty manner.
